amendment.description: Amendment sought to require the event sponsor to provide attendees with a written disclosure outlining the nature of the event and the risks of investing in the securities for sale. Also, it clarifies that attendance at an event does not in itself establish a pre-existing relationship for purposes of Rule 506(b).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Velazquez amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 167 - 249 (Roll no. 29).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Velazquez amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 167 - 249 (Roll no. 29).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Ms. Velazquez.
